targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  data ->>'id' as metric ,
  (data ->>'elv')::numeric - ((data ->>'dist')::numeric/1000) as "elv-dist",
  (data ->>'elv')::numeric as elv
FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND 
  data ->>'id' IN ($satellites)
  AND (data ->>'dist')::numeric < 5000
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  time,
  data ->>'id' as metric ,
  (data ->>'dist')::numeric as dist,
  (data ->>'temp')::numeric as temperature
FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND 
  data ->>'id' IN ($satellites)
  AND (data ->>'dist')::numeric < 5000
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  time,
  data ->>'id' as metric ,
  (data ->>'lat')::numeric as lat,
   (data ->>'lon')::numeric as lon
FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND 
  data ->>'id' IN ($satellites)
--  AND data ->>'dist' IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1,2
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  time,
  data ->>'id' as metric ,
  (data ->>'elv')::numeric - ((data ->>'dist')::numeric/1000)- 0.086 as "elv-dist"
FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND 
  data ->>'id' IN ($satellites)
  AND (data ->>'fix')::numeric = 4
  AND (data ->>'dist')::numeric < 5000
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  date_trunc('hour', time) + date_part('minute', time)::int / 1 * interval '1 min' AS time,
  data ->>'id' as metric ,
  avg((data ->>'elv')::numeric - ((data ->>'dist')::numeric/1000)- 0.086)  OVER (PARTITION BY sensor ORDER BY data ->>'id' ROWS 60 PRECEDING) as "elv-dist_avg1min"
FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND 
  data ->>'id' IN ($satellites)
  AND (data ->>'fix')::numeric = 4
  AND (data ->>'dist')::numeric < 5000
ORDER BY 1,2

panels.title: Cyclopée elv - tirant d'air  FIX RTK

panels.description:
data gnss - distance accoustique - offset capteurs - geoid raf18 + zéro hydro LR 

https://www.sonel.org/IMG/pdf/R10002_LaRochelle_20100729.pdf

https://data.shom.fr/donnees/refmar/189#

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('hour', time- interval'2 hour') + date_part('minute', time)::int / 1 * interval '1 min' AS time,
  data ->>'id' as metric ,
  avg((data ->>'elv')::numeric - ((data ->>'dist')::numeric/1000)- 0.086 - 46.941 + 3.447)  OVER (PARTITION BY sensor ORDER BY data ->>'id' ROWS 60 PRECEDING) as "elv-dist-zeroHydro_avg1min"
FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND 
  data ->>'id' IN ($satellites)
  AND (data ->>'fix')::numeric = 4
  AND (data ->>'dist')::numeric < 5000
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  time - interval'2 hour',
  data ->>'id' as metric ,
  (data ->>'elv')::numeric - ((data ->>'dist')::numeric/1000)- 0.086 - 46.941 + 3.447 as "elv-dist-zeroHydro"
FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND 
  data ->>'id' IN ($satellites)
  AND (data ->>'fix')::numeric = 4
  AND (data ->>'dist')::numeric < 5000
ORDER BY 1,2

panels.title: cyclopée absolu zéro hydro FIX RTK + marégraphe AIX

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  data ->>'id' as metric ,
  (data ->>'BME_Temperature')::numeric as BME_Temperature,
  (data ->>'Co2_Temperature')::numeric as Co2_Temperature

FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND 
  data ->>'id' IN ($satellites)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time,
  data ->>'id' as metric ,
  (data ->>'BME_Humidity')::numeric as BME_Humidity,
  (data ->>'Co2_Humidity')::numeric as Co2_Humidity

FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND 
  data ->>'id' IN ($satellites)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time,
  data ->>'id' as metric ,
  (data ->>'BME_Pressure')::numeric as BME_Pressure

FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND 
  data ->>'id' IN ($satellites)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time,
  data ->>'id' as metric ,
  (data ->>'Co2')::numeric as Co2

FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND 
  data ->>'id' IN ($satellites)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time,
  data ->>'id' as metric ,
  (data ->>'turb')::numeric as Turbidity,
  (data ->>'raw_turb')::numeric as Rawturb
  
FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND 
  data ->>'id' IN ($satellites)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time,
  data ->>'id' as metric ,
  (data ->>'temp')::numeric as Temperature
  
FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND 
  data ->>'id' IN ($satellites)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
 distinct data ->>'id' as metric ,
 jsonb_object_keys(data) as key
FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND 
  data ->>'id' IN ($satellites)
GROUP BY data,key
ORDER BY metric,key ASC

SELECT
  time,
  data ->>'id' as metric ,
  (data ->>'GravityPH')::numeric as Ph,
   --(data ->>'Temperature')::numeric as temperature,
   (data ->>'GravityEC')::numeric as EC,
   (data ->>'GravityTurbidity')::numeric as Turbidity
FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND 
  data ->>'id' IN ($satellites)
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  time,
  data ->>'id' as metric ,
  (data ->>'elv')::numeric - ((data ->>'urm')::numeric/1000) as "elv-urm",
  (data ->>'elv')::numeric - ((data ->>'a01')::numeric/1000) as "elv-a01",
  (data ->>'elv')::numeric - ((data ->>'dist')::numeric/1000) as "elv-dist",
  (data ->>'elv')::numeric as elv
FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND 
  data ->>'id' IN ($satellites)
  --AND data ->>'dist' IS NOT NULL
  --AND (data ->>'urm')::numeric > 1100
  --AND (data ->>'urm')::numeric < 1500
  --AND (data ->>'a01')::numeric > 1100
  AND (data ->>'dist')::numeric < 5000
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  time,
  data ->>'id' as metric ,
  (data ->>'urm')::numeric as urm,
    (data ->>'a01')::numeric as a01,
  (data ->>'dist')::numeric as dist,
  (data ->>'temp')::numeric as temperature
FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND 
  data ->>'id' IN ($satellites)
  --AND data ->>'dist' IS NOT NULL
  --AND (data ->>'urm')::numeric > 1100
  --AND (data ->>'urm')::numeric < 1500
  --AND (data ->>'a01')::numeric > 1100
  AND (data ->>'dist')::numeric < 5000
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  time,
  data ->>'id' as metric ,
  (data ->>'lat')::numeric as lat,
   (data ->>'lon')::numeric as lon
FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND 
  data ->>'id' IN ($satellites)
--  AND data ->>'dist' IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  time,
  data ->>'id' as metric ,
  (data ->>'elv')::numeric - ((data ->>'urm')::numeric/1000)- 0.109 as "elv-urm",
  (data ->>'elv')::numeric - ((data ->>'a01')::numeric/1000)- 0.109 as "elv-a01",
  (data ->>'elv')::numeric - ((data ->>'dist')::numeric/1000)- 0.086 as "elv-dist"
FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND 
  data ->>'id' IN ($satellites)
  --AND data ->>'dist' IS NOT NULL
  --AND (data ->>'urm')::numeric > 1100
  --AND (data ->>'urm')::numeric < 1500
  --AND (data ->>'a01')::numeric > 1100
  AND (data ->>'dist')::numeric < 5000
ORDER BY 1,2

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time - interval'2 hour',
  data ->>'id' as metric ,
  (data ->>'elv')::numeric - ((data ->>'urm')::numeric/1000)- 0.109 - 46.941 + 3.447 as "elv-urm-zeroHydro",
  (data ->>'elv')::numeric - ((data ->>'a01')::numeric/1000)- 0.086 - 46.941 + 3.447 as "elv-a01-zeroHydro",
  (data ->>'elv')::numeric - ((data ->>'dist')::numeric/1000)- 0.086 - 46.941 + 3.447 as "elv-dist-zeroHydro"
FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND 
  data ->>'id' IN ($satellites)
  --AND data ->>'dist' IS NOT NULL
  --AND (data ->>'urm')::numeric > 1100
  --AND (data ->>'urm')::numeric < 1500
  --AND (data ->>'a01')::numeric > 1100
  --AND (data ->>'a01')::numeric < 1500
  AND (data ->>'dist')::numeric < 5000
ORDER BY 1,2

list.definition:
SELECT
 distinct data ->>'id' as metric
FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
 where time > (now() - interval '3 days')
GROUP BY data
ORDER BY metric ASC
list.label: satellites
list.name: satellites
list.query:
SELECT
 distinct data ->>'id' as metric
FROM
  cyclopee.sensor 
 where time > (now() - interval '3 days')
GROUP BY data
ORDER BY metric ASC
